original_text: As for the other events of Abijah’s reign, and all he did, are they not written in the book of the annals of the kings of Judah? There was war between Abijah and Jeroboam.
korean_text: 아비얌과 여로보암 사이에도 전쟁이 있으니라 아비얌의 남은 사적과 그 행한 모든 일은 유다 왕 역대지략에 기록되지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: As for the other events of Abijah's reign
are they not written in the book of the annals
There was war between Abijah and Jeroboam.
